resources.string: These are your lives,when\n they get to 0, the game ends!

This word will fall from the top of the screen. You should decide if it is the correct translation of the another word that\'s on the top! If your answer is wrong, or the word falls to the botton, you lose one life!
This is your score. The higher it gets, the faster the words will fall!
Negative button! Press if the translation is wrong!
Positive button! Press if the translation is correct!

Project made entirely by Felipe Magalh√£es.
